Title: The Secret Life of Pets
Overview: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.
Tagline: Think this is what they do all day?
Keywords: pet, bunny, anthropomorphism, dog, animal, apartment building, sewer, terrier, manhattan, new york city, rodent, mongrel
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Fuji Television Network, Dentsu, Illumination Entertainment
Cast: Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, Kevin Hart
